name: Wyndham Garden San Antonio near La Cantera

reviews.text: We just spent one night while attending a function in the area. The room reminded me of the Aloft rooms minus some of the cool. Clean, comfortable and quiet. The covered patio area was really nice and wish we would have had more time to enjoy that and the hot tub area (little cool for the pool when we were there). After a recent crummy stay at the Westin up the hill (supposed to be nicer - ha!) I have to say the Four Points had much better service, from the really nice front desk guy to the bartender and housekeeper, everyone had a smile and was there to help you with anything you needed.
reviews.title: Great stay - wonderful staff!

reviews.text: Convenient location if you are visiting UTSA or Six Flags. A little noisy since it's close to the interstate. Upscale dining and shopping nearby at Shops at La Cantera. CVS within walking distance. Nice pool and lobby area (although there was a very strong cleansing agent odor in the downstairs common area). Rooms are a little dated - compared to downstairs common areas. Bathroom seemed newer and was spotless (glass door shower). Free Wi-Fi was very helpful and check-in was a breeze. Very good value for rate paid. Would stay again.
reviews.title: Clean, Near Shopping and Interstate

reviews.text: This is an ideal hotel to stay, especially if you are doing business at UTSA. The restaurant serves a great breakfast in the mornings and the hotel has a shuttle that will take you yo many points of interest in the city. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and wifi is free and easy to access.
reviews.title: Wonderfully, Comfortable

reviews.text: Good front desk service, nice bartender, but untrained. Breakfast staff poor service, inattentive - little attention to specific order details. Lobby nice, dirty glassware piled on floor in ice room in hall. Stained carpets in hall and room. Bathroom is good as is a/c.
reviews.title: Well-used, over-tired - needs freshening, not as nice as twin at the airport location

reviews.text: Hotel seems to be new but is starting to show wear & tear.carpets in room stained.Room is larger than most new hotels.Nice sized bathroom only complaint is water runs all over floor making it dangerous.over all room is clean fast & friendly check in.
reviews.title: Good but could be better

aka: 4 Points By Sheraton San Antonio Northwest
description: Four Points by Sheraton San Antonio Northwest is a luxury hotel near Six Flags Fiesta Texas, the Shops at La Cantera, UTSA Campus, Valero Corporate Headquarters, the Alamo, and many golf courses.
